name: Battleships (itch) (Nahuel J. Armando)
description:
Non commercial use

My first game. It's really bad though.  Content
  • 4 playable levels.
  • GUI: Main menu, canvas, Jupiter font made by Isurus Labs, player health and score, win and lose screens.
  • Enemies with different patterns. Wave generator.
  • Power ups.
  • Models from the Unity Assets store.
  • VFX.
  • SFX y music download from http://www.orangefreesounds.com.
  • Victory conditions change by level.
Bugs
  • In level 2 and 4 there's a bug with the enemies. They don't disappear if they reach the bottom of the level.

The scripts are share in the next link: https://github.com/Nj747/Proyecto-Final-Unity-Nivel-Inicial
